title: Quite a few t204s for sale/downgrading
author: shammus

posts.post_title: Quite a few t204s for sale/downgrading
posts.post_content:
I have a large number of extra t204s from recent REA winnings that I thought I'd offer up to the board.  Some of these are available for sale or trade for other t204s.  Others I'll make available for downgrading purposes.  Meaning, if you would like to upgrade your lowergrade example with one of mine, I'm willing to work a cash/trade with you as long as I get your lowergrade example :)
 
Prices below include shipping.  The two lots I won are #178 and #167 and can seen at the links below.  Scans of many of the cards are there although I can provide additional scans if requested.
 
[url]http://bid.robertedwardauctions.com/bidplace.aspx?itemid=30322[/url]
 
[url]http://bid.robertedwardauctions.com/bidplace.aspx?itemid=30311[/url]
 
For Sale and/or willing to "downgrade"
Street SGC 60 - $350
Bancroft SGC 55 - $275 [SOLD!!]
Bransfield SGC 55 - $325 [SOLD!!]
McAleer SGC 55 - $275
Schulte SGC 55 - $275 [SOLD!!]

Unclane (borders trimmed) - $25

Thanks in advance,
Brian
[url]redmaccie@hotmail.com[/url]
